item.description:
If you like Mono you will like these guys.

Who: Dog Look At Airplane (Masaya, Ryan, Sean)

When: Tuesday, September 30, 2008 at 9:00PM

Where: O'briens Pub, 3 Harvard Ave, Allston, MA 02134

Admission: 21+ (BRING YOUR ID), $7.00

A little about the band:
In 2007, Masaya from Niigata, Japan and Ryan from Maine met at one of our meetup events and decided to start a post-rock band. Sean is Ryan's roommate and he happens to look just like Masaya.

This is Dog Look At Airplane's first live gig-- a very special event and they need your support!
They are serious, sometimes sad when they play music but outside of music they are just 3 goofballs. So feel free to approach them after the show and give your friendly feedback.

To hear their music click here

Please spread the word about the show and bring all your friends!
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: Live @ O'briens Pub
